name: run_playbook
description:
Run a playbook on a remote Cortex XSOAR/XSIAM instance.

Requires:
- DEMISTO_BASE_URL environment variable
- DEMISTO_API_KEY environment variable

Use Cases:
- Test playbooks during development
- Validate playbook execution
- Debug playbook flow

wait.description: Wait for playbook completion and return result

timeout.description: Timeout in seconds when waiting for completion
